title: Practice with Loops
description:
Now that you have practiced editing and adding loops with boolean expressions. Use the blocks in the tray to build a program that counts by 5s to a max of 30. This will require that you edit each of the blocks in the tray.

Use one loop to produce the following output.

5
10
15
20
25
30
hint:
Begin by selecting the type of loop you plan to use and drop it into the program. Before the loop, add the variable definitions and select appropriate default values. Then, add the blocks inside the loop to output the value of the integer and increase that number. Finally, add the boolean expression for the loop.

Remember, there are many ways to solve this problem. Use one loop to solve this instead of repeating code manually.
